name: Comet
description: Comet is Stremio's fastest torrent/debrid search add-on, featuring proxy debrid streaming for multi-IP usage, smart torrent ranking, multiple scraper support (Jackett, Prowlarr, Torrentio, Zilean, MediaFusion, etc.), and an admin dashboard with bandwidth management and metrics.
author: g0ldyy

form_fields.label: Admin Dashboard Password
form_fields.hint: Password to access the admin dashboard

form_fields.label: Database Password
form_fields.hint: PostgreSQL database password

form_fields.label: Addon Name
form_fields.hint: Custom name for the Stremio addon

form_fields.label: Enable Proxy Debrid Stream
form_fields.hint: Enable to use debrid services from multiple IPs simultaneously

form_fields.label: Proxy Debrid Stream Password
form_fields.hint: Password for debrid stream proxying (required if proxy enabled)

form_fields.label: Proxy Max Connections
form_fields.hint: Max concurrent proxy connections (-1 = unlimited)

form_fields.label: Enable Torrentio Scraper
form_fields.hint: Enable Torrentio as a torrent source

form_fields.label: Torrentio URL
form_fields.hint: Torrentio instance URL

form_fields.label: Enable Zilean Scraper
form_fields.hint: Enable Zilean DMM scraper

form_fields.label: Zilean URL
form_fields.hint: Zilean instance URL (required if Zilean enabled)

form_fields.label: Enable Prowlarr
form_fields.hint: Enable Prowlarr indexer integration

form_fields.label: Prowlarr URL
form_fields.hint: Prowlarr URL (e.g., http://prowlarr:9696)

form_fields.label: Prowlarr API Key
form_fields.hint: Prowlarr API key for authentication

form_fields.label: Enable Jackett
form_fields.hint: Enable Jackett indexer integration

form_fields.label: Jackett URL
form_fields.hint: Jackett URL (e.g., http://jackett:9117)

form_fields.label: Jackett API Key
form_fields.hint: Jackett API key for authentication

form_fields.label: Enable MediaFusion
form_fields.hint: Enable MediaFusion scraper

form_fields.label: MediaFusion URL
form_fields.hint: MediaFusion instance URL

form_fields.label: MediaFusion API Password
form_fields.hint: API password for MediaFusion (if required)

form_fields.label: Enable Nyaa
form_fields.hint: Enable Nyaa anime scraper

form_fields.label: Nyaa Anime Only
form_fields.hint: Only scrape Nyaa for anime content

form_fields.label: Enable Background Scraper
form_fields.hint: Enable automatic background content scraping

form_fields.label: Background Scraper Interval
form_fields.hint: Interval between scraping cycles in seconds

form_fields.label: Background Scraper Workers
form_fields.hint: Number of concurrent workers for background scraping

form_fields.label: Torrent Cache TTL
form_fields.hint: Seconds before torrents are removed from cache (default 30 days, -1 = never)

form_fields.label: Live Torrent Cache TTL
form_fields.hint: Seconds before triggering new live search (default 7 days)

form_fields.label: Public Base URL
form_fields.hint: Force playback URLs to use this base (e.g., https://comet.example.com)

form_fields.label: Global Proxy URL
form_fields.hint: Global proxy for all outbound requests (e.g., http://user:pass@host:port)

form_fields.label: StremThru URL
form_fields.hint: StremThru service URL for debrid integration

form_fields.label: Digital Release Filter
form_fields.hint: Filter out unreleased content

form_fields.label: Smart Language Detection
form_fields.hint: Enable language detection based on titles and Trakt aliases (experimental)

form_fields.label: Remove Adult Content
form_fields.hint: Filter out adult content from results

form_fields.label: Enable CometNet P2P
form_fields.hint: Enable decentralized P2P torrent metadata sharing (requires FASTAPI_WORKERS=1)

form_fields.label: CometNet Advertise URL
form_fields.hint: Public WebSocket URL for CometNet (e.g., wss://comet.example.com/cometnet/ws)

form_fields.label: CometNet Bootstrap Nodes
form_fields.hint: JSON array of bootstrap node URLs (e.g., ["wss://bootstrap.example.com:8765"])

form_fields.label: CometNet Manual Peers
form_fields.hint: JSON array of trusted peer URLs to connect directly

form_fields.label: CometNet Contribution Mode
form_fields.hint: full/consumer/source/leech - Controls sharing behavior

form_fields.label: CometNet Node Alias
form_fields.hint: Optional friendly name for your CometNet node

form_fields.label: CometNet Max Peers
form_fields.hint: Maximum simultaneous P2P connections (more = more bandwidth)

form_fields.label: CometNet Min Peers
form_fields.hint: Minimum desired peers before active discovery

form_fields.label: CometNet Key Password
form_fields.hint: Optional password to encrypt your node's private key on disk

form_fields.label: CometNet Trusted Pools
form_fields.hint: JSON array of pool IDs to accept torrents from (empty = open mode)

form_fields.label: CometNet Private Network
form_fields.hint: Enable isolated private network mode

form_fields.label: CometNet Network ID
form_fields.hint: Unique identifier for private network (required if private mode enabled)

form_fields.label: CometNet Network Password
form_fields.hint: Shared secret for private network (required if private mode enabled)

form_fields.label: CometNet UPnP Enabled
form_fields.hint: Enable UPnP to automatically open ports on your router (for NAT traversal)
